label: ham
subject:
Re: [sugar] [PATCH] unfreeze DCON when Sugar UI is (almost) ready
 to	show
body: 55. Let it suffice to have said so much about these matters; and as to the question how and by what exploits being Egyptians they received the sceptres of royalty over the Dorians, we will omit these things, since others have told about them; but the things with which other narrators have not dealt, of these I will make mention.
